name: Joshua LaMoria
text:
TERRIBLE!
I ordered a pepperoni pizza, howie rolls, cinna bread and a howie bread. The pepperoni pizza was chewy and the crust was burnt. The cinna bread was harder than a hockey puck. The howie rolls were soggy ü§Æ. They forgot the howie bread completely!!

name: Amanda Wendell
text: Not bad pizza. It is definitely better some days than others..pricing is not bad either.

name: Quipmunk
text: This place has unfortunately lost all of its consistency. Over the past year I would say about 1 out of every 4 pies I get are undercooked and soggy with grease. I‚Äôm a man that loves his Hungry Howie‚Äôs Pizza and I hope they get this fixed, but for now I‚Äôm taking a long break from the bad axe location.

name: Michelle Hazard
text: Very greasy. Not to happy with it!

name: Stan Kondziolka
text: Good and friendly service-place was clean.The pizza tasted great.

name: Brian B
text: The pizza was under cooked.

name: robert bieda
text: Understaffed, employees lacking knowledge, and the 2 pizzas and stuffed Howie bread were ALL burnt. And then asked we could wait for them to remake order. With 6 people in line behind us. So I assumed it would be an hour to remake the order

name: Babca1978ann 2012
text: Friendly . when there is a mistake on pizza they are quick to make the customer happy .

name: Scotty Tucker
text: Great pizza and service.

name: Ryan Simmons
text: No problems, easy and quick

name: Christine Karl
text: Yummy pizza

name: Jen Needsadrink
text: We ordered just before close and the pizza was a little undercooked. Brought it back and they stayed open just to cook us another, with a smile. Very pleased, they could have easily not picked up the phone or told us to come back tomorrow for a new one. And the second one was PERFECT.  Thank you!

name: Peggy Ahearn
text: Not real happy after 15plus Years they won't deliver to my address any more even tho  they drive by my road and go 2mile pass it they can't come down a quarter mile won't buy there any more

name: Its Kenzie
text: I live 4 minutes away, pizza took 45 minutes to get here, I stood on my porch the whole time, driver showed up after speeding down my road ,took 3 minutes to get out of his car, then said he knocked on our door for 5 minutes, which he did ‚Ä¶More

text: Fast and friendly

text: Very inconsistent! One day their decent, the next my pizza is so undercooked the cheese isn‚Äôt melted on part of the pizza. But they certainly did a great job burning the calzone and bread sticks I ordered. Get it together Hungry Howies in Bad Axe.

text: You can take your order into the Longshot Lanes bowling alley next door.
